summary: This is a comedy about mistaken identities, a hitman who sees everything in terms of the movies, and a twenty-year-old diamond heist.
cast: Christian Slater|Tim Allen|Portia de Rossi|Richard Dreyfuss|Billy Connolly|Peter MacNeill|Bill MacDonald|Richard Chevolleau|Elias Zarou|RuPaul|Joseph Scoren|Eugene Lipinski|Shawn Doyle|Louis Di Bianco|Tony Nappo|Tim Progosh|A.C. McQueen|Kevin Rushton|Rick Demas|Martin Roach|Quancetia Hamilton|Corinne Jenner|Mauricio Rodas|Diego Fuentes|Michael Sercerchi|Chloe Stearns
title: ¿Quién es Cletis T...?
